text: (ai rasool) un logon se kah do ki kya main tumako un sab cheezon se behatar cheez bata doon (achchha suno) jin logon ne parahezagaaree ikhteyaar kee unake lie unake paravaradigaar ke yaho (behisht) ke vah baagaat hain jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain (aur vah) hamesha usamen rahenge aur usake alaava unake lie saaph sutharee beeviyo hain aur (sabase badhakar) khuda kee khushanoodee hai aur khuda (apane) un bandon ko khoob dekh raha he jo duaain moga karate hain
